derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wīn, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch wijn, German Wein, based on Latin vinum

encyclopedia.content: wine，是一款优秀的Linux系统平台下的模拟器软件，用来将Windows系统下的软件在Linux系统下稳定运行，该软件更新频繁，日臻完善，可以运行许多大型Windows系统下的软件。另外英语单词wine是葡萄酒的意思。

entry.def: Wine is an alcoholic drink which is made from grapes. You can also refer to alcoholic drinks made from other fruits or vegetables as wine .
Wine is used to describe things that are very dark red in colour.

example.ex: She wore her wine-coloured gaberdine raincoat.
example.tran: 她穿着深红色华达呢雨衣。
橄榄绿与深红色相间的羊毛衫

entry.def: If you wine and dine, or if someone wines and dines you, you go out, for example to expensive restaurants, and spend a lot of money.

example.ex: Colleagues were furious at doing her work while she wined and dined...
example.tran: 同事们干着她的活儿，而她却在外面大吃大喝，这让大家都气坏了。

example.ex: A lot of money went on wining and dining prospective clients.
example.tran: 很多钱都花在宴请潜在客户上了。
